document.full_text: germany's sandra gal, wielding a red-hot putter, charged into a share of the early lead in the opening round of the kraft nabisco championship on thursday.
document.title: sizzling putter helps gal into early tie for nabisco lpga lead
lines_and_colors: germany's sandra gal, wielding a red-hot putter, charged into a share of the early lead in the opening round of the kraft nabisco championship on thursday.
